coderDojoController: Blocks for using the CoderDojo Game Controller
coderDojoController.buttonIsPressed: Get the button state (pressed or not) for any of the 8 controller buttons. Buttons A and B are the same as on the Micro:bit
coderDojoController.buttonIsPressed|para: the button to query, eg: CoderDojoButton.Left
check if button is pressed or not, eg: CoderDojoButtonState.Pressed
coderDojoController.onButtonPress: Run code when a button on the controller is pressed or released. Buttons A and B on the controller are the same as buttons A and B on the Micro:bit
coderDojoController.onButtonPress|param|: the button to query, eg: CoderDojoButtonID.Left
run code when the button is either pressed or released, eg: CoderDojoButtonEvent.Pressed
coderDojoController.setRedLed: Turn the red LED on the controller on or off
coderDojoController.setRedLed|param|stat: turn the LED either on or off, eg: CoderDojoLedState.On
